author: pauls
msg: The issue is that we log messages while holding framework internal locks -- hence, when a log service calls back into the framework (e.g., by loading a class) we might deadlock. For now we just disable logging to log services inside the framework. (FELIX-536)

author: hboutemy
msg: [MNG-3509] added default locale and platform encoding to "mvn -v" output (merged from trunk r647626)
